lead_paragraph: NOTTIDGE--Mariette B. (Metta), of 176 East 71st Street, New York, NY on May 25, 2016 at Lennox Hill Hospital, New York, age 76. Beloved wife of O. Richard Nottidge and mother of the late Simon F. R. Nottidge; sister of Anne Marie Dwyer, of the late Joseph R. Dwyer and of Jim Dwyer and his wife Anne; sister-in-law to Faith Miller and H. Andrew Nottidge and his wife Pamela; aunt to many nephews and nieces. Metta was born February 1, 1940 in Sydney, New South Wales, to Frank A. Dwyer, barrister and later Justice of the Supreme Court of New South Wales, and the former Anne J. Glennon, of Dublin. After working for barristers for years in Sydney, Metta joined the UN Secretariat in New York where she worked in the office of the Legal Counsel and met Richard working two floors up in the Office of Personnel. They married in her Parish Church in Mosman, New South Wales, on February 11, 1969. Their son, Simon, born November 24, 1969, died November 22, 1989 after a boating accident in Maine. Viewing Thursday, June 2, from 7-9pm at John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Avenue (between 69 and 70), New York; Mass of the Resurrection will be held Friday, June 3 at 11am, St. Vincent Ferrer, Lexington Avenue, New York (at 66th Street). Burial at Nassau Knolls Memorial Park, Port Washington Blvd, Port Washington, NY. 1/3
